DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel group study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability two dos ( 50 100 mg ) NBI-98854 administer daily 2 week . The study also allow evaluation efficacy NBI-98854 50 mg daily 6 week safety tolerability NBI 98854 50 mg daily 12 week .
